00051 /**
00052  * @class CallSetTest
00053  * @brief cppunit class for testing CallSet behavior
00054  */
00055 /*****************************************************************************/
00056 class CallSetTest : public CppUnit::TestFixture
00057 {
00058 
00059 private:
00060 
00061   map<string, CallSet*> csTestCases;
00062 
00063 
00064   string m_defaultTranslationTableFileName;
00065   string m_programName;
00066   string m_outputDir;
00067 
00068   TranslationTableModel *m_ttm;
00069   RunTimeEnvironment m_rte;
00070 
00071   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE(CallSetTest);
00072   CPPUNIT_TEST(describeVerbose);
00073   CPPUNIT_TEST(operator_equal);
00074   CPPUNIT_TEST(addCallElement);
00075   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_END();
00076 
00077 public:
00078   void setUp();
00079   void operator_equal();
00080   void describeVerbose();
00081   void addCallElement();
00082 
00083 };
00084 // end class CallSetTest
00085 /*****************************************************************************/
00086 /*****************************************************************************/
00087 /**
00088  * Initialization method called before each test routine.
00089  */
00090 /*****************************************************************************/
00091 void CallSetTest::setUp()
00092 {
00093 
00094 
00095   cerr << endl;
00096 
00097 
00098   m_programName = "CallSetTest_setUp";
00099   m_defaultTranslationTableFileName =
00100     TEST_DATA_UNIT_DIR  + "TTable_v20080110_EarlyAccess.txt";
00101 
00102   m_outputDir = "output";
00103 
00104   m_rte.m_adtOpts.m_progName = m_programName;
00105   m_rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir = m_outputDir;
00106 
00107   m_rte.m_adtOpts.m_verbosity = ADT_VERBOSE_INPUT_FILES;
00108 
00109   m_rte.initializeRunTimeEnvironment();
00110 
00111   m_rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableType = ADT_TRANSLATION_TABLE_TYPE_DMET2;
00112 
00113   m_ttm = new TranslationTableModel(m_rte,
00114                                     m_defaultTranslationTableFileName,
00115                                     ADT_TRANSLATION_TABLE_TYPE_DMET2);
00116 
00117 
00118   // Add MARKER Allele call sets as test cases.
00119   for (int row = 1; row < 24; row ++) {
00120 
00121     stringstream setNameSStr;
00122     //cerr << ttm->rows[row][0] << ttm->rows[row][1] << endl;
00123 
00124     setNameSStr << "marker" << row;
00125     csTestCases[setNameSStr.str()] = new CallSet(setNameSStr.str());
00126     csTestCases[setNameSStr.str()]
00127     ->addCallElement(*(m_ttm), row, m_ttm->getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_REFERENCE)
00128                      , true, false);
00129   }
00130 
00131   // Add a HAPLOTYPE Allele call set as test cases.
00132 
00133   csTestCases["haplotype1"] = new CallSet("haplotype1");
00134   csTestCases["haplotype2"] = new CallSet("haplotype2");
00135 
00136 
00137   for (int row = 73; row < 80; row++) {
00138 
00139     //cerr << m_ttm->m_rows[row][0] << m_ttm->m_rows[row][1] << endl;
00140     vector<int> alleleColumns = m_ttm->getHaplotypeAlleleColumns(row);
00141 
00142 
00143     if (alleleColumns.size() > 0) {
00144 
00145       for (int column = 0; column < alleleColumns.size(); column++) {
00146 
00147         csTestCases["haplotype1"]
00148         ->addCallElement(*(m_ttm), row, alleleColumns[column], true, true);
00149         csTestCases["haplotype2"]
00150         ->addCallElement(*(m_ttm), row, alleleColumns[column], true, true);
00151       }
00152     }
00153   }
00154 
00155   return;
00156 }
00157 /*****************************************************************************/
00158 /*****************************************************************************/
00159 /**
00160  * CallSet::operator== test cases.
00161  *
00162  */
00163 /*****************************************************************************/
00164 
00165 void CallSetTest::operator_equal()
00166 {
00167   cout << endl;
00168   Util::PrintTextFunctionTitle("CallSetTest", "operator_equal");
00169   Err::setThrowStatus(true);
00170 
00171 
00172   // isDescriptive, always false if either is not descriptive.
00173   cerr << "operator==, isDescriptive: a != a, !a.m_isDescriptive...";
00174   CPPUNIT_ASSERT(*csTestCases["marker1"] != *csTestCases["marker1"]);
00175   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00176 
00177   cerr << "operator==, isDescriptive: a == a, a.m_isDescriptive...";
00178   csTestCases["marker1"]->m_isDescriptive = true;
00179   CPPUNIT_ASSERT(*csTestCases["marker1"] == *csTestCases["marker1"]);
00180   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00181 
00182 
00183   csTestCases["marker3"]->m_isDescriptive = true;
00184   //csTestCases["marker3"]->describeVerbose(rte );
00185   //csTestCases["marker4"]->describeVerbose(rte );
00186 
00187   cerr << "operator==, isDescriptive: a != b, a.m_isDescriptive and !b.m_isDescriptive...";
00188   CPPUNIT_ASSERT(*csTestCases["marker3"] != *csTestCases["marker4"]);
00189   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00190 
00191 
00192   cerr << "operator==, isDescriptive: a == b, a.m_isDescriptive and b.m_isDescriptive...";
00193   csTestCases["marker4"]->m_isDescriptive = true;
00194   CPPUNIT_ASSERT(*csTestCases["marker3"] == *csTestCases["marker4"]);
00195   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00196 
00197 
00198   cerr << "operator==, set size not equal: a != b, a.size() != b.size()...";
00199   csTestCases["haplotype1"]->m_isDescriptive = true;
00200   CPPUNIT_ASSERT(*csTestCases["marker1"] != *csTestCases["haplotype1"]);
00201   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00202 
00203   cerr << "operator==, set size = 1: a == b...";
00204   CPPUNIT_ASSERT(*csTestCases["marker3"] == *csTestCases["marker4"]);
00205   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00206 
00207   cerr << "operator==, set size > 1: a == b...";
00208   csTestCases["haplotype2"]->m_isDescriptive = true;
00209   CPPUNIT_ASSERT(*csTestCases["haplotype1"] == *csTestCases["haplotype2"]);
00210   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00211 
00212   return;
00213 }
00214 // end CallSetTest::operator_equal
00215 /*****************************************************************************/
00216 /*****************************************************************************/
00217 /**
00218  * CallSet::describeVerboe test cases.
00219  *
00220  */
00221 /*****************************************************************************/
00222 void CallSetTest::describeVerbose()
00223 {
00224   cout << endl;
00225   Util::PrintTextFunctionTitle("CallSetTest", "describeVerbose");
00226   Err::setThrowStatus(true);
00227 
00228   m_rte.m_currentVerbosity = ADT_VERBOSE_INPUT_FILES ;
00229 
00230   Verbose::setLevel(ADT_VERBOSE_INPUT_FILES);
00231 
00232   cerr << "describeVerbose: marker1->describeVerbose(rte)..." << endl;
00233   csTestCases["marker1"]->describeVerbose(m_rte);
00234   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00235 
00236   cerr << "describeVerbose: haplotype1->describeVerbose(rte)..." << endl;
00237   csTestCases["haplotype1"]->describeVerbose(m_rte);
00238   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00239 
00240   return;
00241 }
00242 // end CallSetTest::describeVerbose
00243 /*****************************************************************************/
00244 /*****************************************************************************/
00245 /**
00246  * CallSet::addCallElement test cases.
00247  *
00248  */
00249 /*****************************************************************************/
00250 void CallSetTest::addCallElement()
00251 {
00252   cout << endl;
00253   Util::PrintTextFunctionTitle("CallSetTest", "addCallElement");
00254   Err::setThrowStatus(true);
00255 
00256   CallSet callset1("callset1");
00257 
00258   cerr << "addCallElement, duplicate CallElement, allowMultiAllelic = false: !callset1.addCallElement(duplicate)...";
00259   CPPUNIT_ASSERT(callset1.addCallElement(*(m_ttm), 1, m_ttm->getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_REFERENCE)));
00260   CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!callset1.addCallElement(*(m_ttm), 1, m_ttm->getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_REFERENCE)));
00261   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00262 
00263   cerr << "addCallElement, duplicate CallElement, allowMultiAllelic = true: callset1.addCallElement(duplicate)...";
00264   CPPUNIT_ASSERT(callset1.addCallElement(*(m_ttm), 1, m_ttm->getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_REFERENCE), true));
00265   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00266 
00267   cerr << "addCallElement, invalid column dbSNP: callset1.addCallElement(DBSNPS_INDEX)...";
00268   NEGATIVE_TEST(callset1.addCallElement(*(m_ttm), 1, m_ttm->getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_DBSNP)), Except);
00269   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00270 
00271 
00272   return;
00273 }
00274 // end CallSetTest::addCallElement
00275 /*****************************************************************************/

00278 // Registers the fixture into the 'registry'
00279 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION(CallSetTest);
